Iwuanyanwu Nationale team's manager, Uche Ejimofor, disclosed to PMSport at the weekend that the managementofthe Owerrl based team would settle the insurance case of the Oriental Airline crash victims in January. Iwuanyanwu Nationale team's manager, Uche Ejimofor, disclosed to PMSport at the weekend that the managementofthe Owerrl based team would settle the insurance case of the Oriental Airline crash victims in January.

Reacting to some players' claims that the management did not want to pay the insur- ance claim, Ejimofor said, "my players are being used by the lawyer who wants to make money out of them. Reacting to some players' claims that the management did not want to pay the insur- ance claim, Ejimofor said, "my players are being used by the lawyer who wants to make money out of them.

"Have you ever heard of where Insurance claims are paid within two months. The lawyers is interested in the money he's going to make "Have you ever heard of where Insurance claims are paid within two months. The lawyers is interested in the money he's going to make

out of these players, hence this unnecessary noise. "We've put all their claims together forthem. They will all be settled by January". Speaking on the team's preparations for next season, Ejimofor revealed that only eleven players would be re- tained while others would be laid off. out of these players, hence this unnecessary noise. Speaking on the team's preparations for next season, Ejimofor revealed that only eleven players would be re- tained while others would be laid off.

"We are retaining the disci- plined and dedicated players, while the indisciplined ones have to go. Indiscipline con- tributed to our woeful perfor- mance this year. That will not be condoned next season", Ejimofor said. "We are retaining the disci- plined and dedicated players, while the indisciplined ones have to go.
